name: vue-quill-editor

scripts.build: npm run build:spa && npm run build:ssr
scripts.finish: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
scripts.publish: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test NODE_ENV=testing karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.unit: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test NODE_ENV=testing karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js --watch
